name: Klean Kanteen Classic Stainless Steel Bottle 800ml
description: This slim bottle is just the right size to slide into a messenger bag. Stainless steel with a chip-resistant finish stands up to the rigours of daily life.Klean Coat™ chip-resistant, powder coat finish is more durable than ever. Using the chemical hazard assessment known as GreenSceen®, Klean Kanteen developed a formulation that is safer for people and the planet.Made of food-grade stainless steel.Simple loop-top cap can be clipped to a pack or bag.Brushed bottles are dishwasher-safe, but painted bottles should be hand-washed.
